product_description.title: Ultraboost 20 Shoes
product_description.subtitle: Touch down with control, ride with comfort.
product_description.text: A new day. A new run. Make it your best. These high-performance shoes feature a foot-hugging knit upper. Stitched-in reinforcement is precisely placed to give you support in the places you need it most. The soft elastane heel delivers a more comfortable fit. Responsive cushioning returns energy to your stride with every footstrike for that I-could-run-forever feeling.
usps: Midsole drop: 10 mm (heel 22 mm / forefoot 12 mm)

product_highlights.headline: Sock-like fit
product_highlights.copy: The adidas Primeknit upper wraps the foot with a supportive fit that enhances movement.

product_highlights.headline: Optimal energy return
product_highlights.copy: The midsole contains 20% more Boost for an amplified Boost feeling.

product_highlights.headline: Precise support
product_highlights.copy: Tailored Fiber Placement provides stitched-in reinforcement right where you need it.

product_description.title: Ultraboost 20 Shoes
product_description.subtitle: High-performance running shoes with a precise fit.
product_description.text: Confidence from the ground up. These adidas running shoes are designed to turbo charge your daily miles. The knit upper offers stitched-in support based on motion capture technology. A soft, comfortable elastane heel allows for natural movement of the Achilles. Responsive cushioning helps keep transitions smooth and the energy flowing.
usps: Midsole drop: 10 mm (heel 22 mm / forefoot 12 mm)

product_highlights.headline: Foot-hugging upper
product_highlights.copy: The adidas Primeknit upper wraps the foot with a supportive fit that enhances movement.

product_highlights.headline: Optimal energy return
product_highlights.copy: The midsole contains 20% more Boost for an amplified Boost feeling.

product_highlights.headline: Precise support
product_highlights.copy: Tailored Fiber Placement provides stitched-in reinforcement right where you need it.

product_description.title: NMD_R1 Shoes
product_description.subtitle: NMD shoes with glimmering metallic style.
product_description.text: Don't be afraid to shine. These shoes have the best of adidas' latest technical innovations, combined with style that honors the past. A metallic color-fade midsole and metallic midsole plugs give them a gleaming look.
usps: Iconic street shoes with metallic hits
